page.title: 07A BUILDER'S DAY
page.content: My Dad gets up at 6.30.am.He dresses and goes downstairs.He has a cup of tea and something to eat for breakfast. Then he makes all his phone calls and opens the bills before he goes to houses to do estimates for new work. After that he goes to Finney's build- er's yard in Blythe Bridge.He meets his work mates and they plan their work. When they have finished they start to dig the foundations and level the ground.At 12 they have dinner.After that they start building again until 6 but Dad goes to see other houses so that he can see what people want him to build.Then he comes home, has tea and starts doing bills, drawing plans or doing estimates.He watches TV then at 10 goes upstairs to bed.
